definitions: a material that fluoresces when struck by a charged particle or high-energy photon

examples.text: Model A intended for use with solid scintillators

shortDefinitions: material that fluoresces when struck by charged particle or high-energy photon

definitions: a detector for charged particles and gamma rays in which scintillations produced in a phosphor are detected and amplified by a photomultiplier, giving an electrical output signal.
shortDefinitions: detector for charged particles and gamma rays in which scintillations produced in phosphor are detected and amplified by photomultiplier
